summary: This is a cover email from Judge Alison J. Nathan's chambers forwarding a memo endorsement in the case U.S. v. Maxwell (20cr330) to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York and defense counsel Jeff Pagliuca. It indicates the document will be publicly filed on the following Monday.

persons.name: Nathan NYSD Chambers
persons.context: Appears as the sender of the email forwarding a court document from Judge Nathan's chambers.

persons.name: Jeff Pagliuca
persons.context: Recipient of the email, identified as counsel, likely representing Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Alison J. Nathan
persons.context: The judge presiding over the U.S. v. Maxwell case; her chambers issued the memo endorsement.

connections.description: Judge Nathan is presiding over the case in which Pagliuca is defense counsel.

events.title: Memo Endorsement Issued
events.description: Judge Nathan issues a memo endorsement in the case U.S. v. Maxwell.

keyFacts: The document is a communication regarding case 20cr330, U.S. v. Maxwell.
A memo endorsement was issued by Judge Alison J. Nathan on October 15, 2021.
The memo was to be filed on the public docket on the Monday following October 15, 2021.
The email was sent to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York and defense counsel Jeff Pagliuca.
